alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 10:35PM MST until November 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected, including during the Monday afternoon and potentially Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County
